org.crosswire.jsword.book
类 BooksEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      org.crosswire.jsword.book.BooksEvent
所有已实现的接口：
java.io.Serializable
public class BooksEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

A BooksEvent is fired whenever a Bible is added or removed from the system.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors., 序列化表格

          Basic constructor
 
方法摘要

          Get the name of the changed Book
 boolean isAddition()
          Is this an addition event?
 
从类 java.util.EventObject 继承的方法
getSource, toString
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

构造函数详细信息

BooksEvent

public BooksEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                  Book book,
                  boolean added)
Basic constructor

参数：
book - The book of the changed Bible, or null if there is more than one change.
added - True if the changed Bible is an addition.
方法详细信息

getBook

public Book getBook()
Get the name of the changed Book

返回：
The Book

isAddition

public boolean isAddition()
Is this an addition event?
